languages.text: "Не зря моя команда вас опасается — вы настоящее чудовище. Впередь не покидайте свои палаты без надобности".

traits.locale_text: "Не зря моя команда вас опасается — вы настоящее чудовище. Впередь не покидайте свои палаты без надобности".

languages.text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."
languages.original_text: "Не зря моя команда вас опасается — вы настоящее чудовище. Впередь не покидайте свои палаты без надобности".

traits.locale_text: "My crew has a just reason to fear you — you are a real monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."
"My crew has a just reason to fear you — you are a real monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."
"My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."
"My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."
"My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

languages.text: “我的船员确实有充分的理由惧怕你，你确实是个怪物。从现在开始，除非有绝对必要，否则我禁止你离开你的房间。”
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: “我的船员确实有充分的理由惧怕你，你确实是个怪物。从现在开始，除非有绝对必要，否则我禁止你离开你的房间。”

languages.text: «Mi tripulación la teme con razón. Es un auténtico monstruo. Desde ahora, le prohíbo que salga de su camarote salvo que sea estrictamente necesario».
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: «Mi tripulación la teme con razón. Es un auténtico monstruo. Desde ahora, le prohíbo que salga de su camarote salvo que sea estrictamente necesario».

languages.text: 「私の乗組員がカシア殿を恐れる理由は十分にある…そなたは本物の怪物なのだからな。今後、絶対に必要なとき以外は、寝室から出ることを禁ずる」
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「私の乗組員がカシア殿を恐れる理由は十分にある…そなたは本物の怪物なのだからな。今後、絶対に必要なとき以外は、寝室から出ることを禁ずる」

languages.text: "Meine Crew hat guten Grund, Euch zu fürchten – Ihr seid wahrhaftig ein Monster. Von nun an dürft Ihr Euer Quartier nur noch verlassen, wenn es unbedingt erforderlich ist."
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Crew hat guten Grund, Euch zu fürchten – Ihr seid wahrhaftig ein Monster. Von nun an dürft Ihr Euer Quartier nur noch verlassen, wenn es unbedingt erforderlich ist."

languages.text: « Mon équipage a toutes les raisons de vous craindre : vous êtes un monstre. À compter de cet instant, je vous interdis formellement de quitter vos quartiers sauf cas de force majeure. »
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: « Mon équipage a toutes les raisons de vous craindre : vous êtes un monstre. À compter de cet instant, je vous interdis formellement de quitter vos quartiers sauf cas de force majeure. »

languages.text: "Mürettebatımın senden korkmak için geçerli sebepleri var. Sen gerçek bir canavarsın. Bu andan itibaren çok zaruri olmadığı sürece odandan çıkmanı yasaklıyorum."
languages.original_text: "My crew has good reason to fear you — you truly are a monster. From now on I forbid you to leave your chambers unless absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebatımın senden korkmak için geçerli sebepleri var. Sen gerçek bir canavarsın. Bu andan itibaren çok zaruri olmadığı sürece odandan çıkmanı yasaklıyorum."
